BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 020259Z MAR BY
   M/V NPS VERITAS VIKING TOWING EIGHT 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-40.60S 041-24.42W, 24-53.10S 041-56.87W,
   24-51.88S 041-23.98W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 020359Z MAR.
